name: io.github.sambaleuk/vibetape-mcp
description: Record the vibe of your build! Captures key development moments (wins, fails, decisions), creates AI-powered RETEX cards, and enables instant recall of past solutions. Perfect for solo developers and teams.

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for semantic search and RETEX generation (optional - falls back to TF-IDF)

environmentVariables.name: VIBETAPE_HOME
environmentVariables.description: Custom storage directory for VibeTape data (default: ~/.vibetape)

environmentVariables.name: VIBETAPE_TEAM_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Team collaboration directory for shared moments (optional)

tools.name: mark_moment
tools.description: Capture a key build moment with safe context snapshot

tools.name: search_moments
tools.description: Find similar moments using semantic search

tools.name: search_moments_advanced
tools.description: Advanced search with filters (tags, dates, regex, semantic)

tools.name: link_moments
tools.description: Create relationships between moments (causes, solves, relates)

tools.name: make_retex
tools.description: Generate AI-powered prescriptive RETEX cards from moments

tools.name: recurrent_patterns
tools.description: Detect recurring patterns in development issues

resources.name: moment
resources.description: Individual captured moments with full context

resources.name: export
resources.description: Full data exports in JSON or Markdown format

prompts.name: induce-retex
prompts.description: Template for generating RETEX cards from moment data

prompts.name: commit-msg
prompts.description: Helper for creating conventional commit messages

instructions: 3. Build the project: npm run build
4. Configure Claude Desktop with absolute path to dist/server.js
5. Optional: Set OPENAI_API_KEY for enhanced features
